faqs.question: What is Netflix?
faqs.answer: Netflix is a streaming service that offers a wide variety of TV shows, movies, anime, documentaries, and more on thousands of internet-connected devices.

faqs.question: How much does Netflix cost?
faqs.answer: Watch Netflix on your smartphone, tablet, Smart TV, laptop, or streaming device, all for one fixed monthly fee. Plans range from $8.99 to $17.99 a month. No extra costs, no contracts.

faqs.question: Where can I watch?
faqs.answer: Watch anywhere, anytime, on an unlimited number of devices. Sign in with your Netflix account to watch instantly on the web at netflix.com from your personal computer or on any internet-connected device that offers the Netflix app, such as smart TVs, smartphones, tablets, streaming media players, and game consoles.

faqs.question: How do I cancel?
faqs.answer: Netflix is flexible. There are no pesky contracts and no commitments. You can easily cancel your account online in two clicks. There are no cancellation fees – start or stop your account anytime.

faqs.question: What can I watch on Netflix?
faqs.answer: Netflix has an extensive library of feature films, documentaries, TV shows, anime, award-winning Netflix originals, and more. Watch as much as you want, anytime you want.

faqs.question: Is Netflix good for kids?
faqs.answer: The Netflix Kids experience is included in your membership to give parents control while kids enjoy family-friendly TV shows and movies in their own space. Kids profiles come with PIN-protected parental controls that let you restrict the maturity rating of content kids can watch and block specific titles you don’t want kids to see.

faqs.question: What is Amazon Prime?
faqs.answer: Amazon Prime is a paid subscription service offered by Amazon that gives users access to services that would otherwise be unavailable, or cost extra, to the typical Amazon customer. This includes free two-day delivery, streaming music and video, and other benefits.

faqs.question: How much does Amazon Prime cost?
faqs.answer: Amazon Prime costs $12.99 per month or $119 per year. Amazon Prime Video costs $8.99 per month.

faqs.question: Where can I watch Amazon Prime?
faqs.answer: Amazon Prime Video is available on a wide variety of devices, including smart TVs, tablets, smartphones, and computers. You can also watch on your computer through a web browser.

faqs.question: How do I cancel Amazon Prime?
faqs.answer: To cancel your Amazon Prime membership, go to Manage Prime Membership. Depending on whether you have a paid membership or are on a free trial, do one of the following: To end a paid membership, click End membership, which is the second option on the left-hand side of the page.

faqs.question: What can I watch on Amazon Prime?
faqs.answer: Amazon Prime Video offers access to thousands of movies and TV shows, including popular licensed and self-produced content.

faqs.question: Is Amazon Prime good for kids?
faqs.answer: Amazon Prime Video offers a wide variety of kids' TV shows and movies, including popular licensed and self-produced content. Parents can set up a Kids profile to restrict the content their children can access.

faqs.question: What is Disney+?
faqs.answer: Disney+ is a subscription video on-demand streaming service owned and operated by the Direct-to-Consumer & International division of The Walt Disney Company.

faqs.question: How much does Disney+ cost?
faqs.answer: Disney+ costs $7.99 per month or $79.99 per year. Disney+ also offers a bundle with Hulu and ESPN+ for $13.99 per month.

faqs.question: Where can I watch Disney+?
faqs.answer: Disney+ is available on a wide variety of devices, including smart TVs, tablets, smartphones, and computers. You can also watch on your computer through a web browser.

faqs.question: How do I cancel Disney+?
faqs.answer: To cancel your Disney+ subscription, go to your account settings and click on the 'Cancel Subscription' button. You will be asked to confirm your cancellation, and your subscription will be canceled at the end of your current billing cycle.

faqs.question: What can I watch on Disney+?
faqs.answer: Disney+ offers access to a wide variety of movies and TV shows from Disney, Pixar, Marvel, Star Wars, and National Geographic. This includes popular licensed content as well as exclusive original content.

faqs.question: Is Disney+ good for kids?
faqs.answer: Disney+ offers a wide variety of kids' TV shows and movies from Disney, Pixar, Marvel, Star Wars, and National Geographic. Parents can set up a Kids profile to restrict the content their children can access.

faqs.question: What is Hulu?
faqs.answer: Hulu is a subscription video on-demand streaming service that offers a wide variety of TV shows, movies, anime, documentaries, and more on thousands of internet-connected devices.

faqs.question: How much does Hulu cost?
faqs.answer: Hulu offers several different subscription plans, ranging from $5.99 to $64.99 per month. The cost of Hulu varies depending on the plan you choose and whether you opt for the ad-supported or ad-free version.

faqs.question: Where can I watch Hulu?
faqs.answer: Hulu is available on a wide variety of devices, including smart TVs, tablets, smartphones, and computers. You can also watch on your computer through a web browser.

faqs.question: How do I cancel Hulu?

faqs.question: What can I watch on Hulu?
faqs.answer: Hulu offers access to thousands of movies and TV shows, including popular licensed and self-produced content. Hulu also offers live TV streaming and access to premium channels like HBO and Showtime.

faqs.question: Is Hulu good for kids?
faqs.answer: Hulu offers a wide variety of kids' TV shows and movies, including popular licensed and self-produced content. Parents can set up a Kids profile to restrict the content their children can access.

faqs.answer: Kanopy is available on a wide variety of devices, including smart TVs, tablets, smartphones, and computers. You can also watch on your computer through a web browser.

faqs.question: How do I cancel Kanopy?
faqs.answer: To cancel your Kanopy subscription, go to your account settings and click on the 'Cancel Subscription' button. You will be asked to confirm your cancellation, and your subscription will be canceled at the end of your current billing cycle.

faqs.question: What can I watch on Kanopy?
faqs.answer: Kanopy offers access to thousands of independent films, documentaries, and TV shows, including popular licensed and self-produced content. Kanopy also offers access to premium channels like HBO and Showtime.

faqs.question: Is Kanopy good for kids?
faqs.answer: Kanopy offers a wide variety of independent films, documentaries, and TV shows. Parents can set up a Kids profile to restrict the content their children can access.
